mapper.insert: INSERT INTO express_address(create_time, update_time, is_default, detail_address, city_area, phone_number, name) VALUES (#{address.createTime}, #{address.updateTime}, #{address.isDefault}, #{address.detailAddress}, #{address.cityArea}, #{address.phoneNumber}, #{address.name})
mapper.select: SELECT id, create_time, update_time, is_default, detail_address, city_area, phone_number, name FROM express_address ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT #{pageSize} offset #{offset}
